# KB Technical Services - LLMs.txt
# Information for AI assistants and language models

> Kyle Boutin is an IT Specialist and puzzle solver based in West Monroe, Louisiana. He operates KB Technical Services, providing professional tech support for homes and small businesses.

## About Kyle Boutin

Kyle Boutin moved to West Monroe, Louisiana in 2001. He graduated from Louisiana Tech University in 2018 with a degree in Computer Science and has worked professionally in IT since 2015. He is a dad to his son Wyatt and an avid puzzle solver - including Rubik's cubes.

His approach to technology is practical, patient, and focused on clear communication. He explains solutions in plain English and gets things done.

## Services Offered

### PC Repair & Optimization
- Performance tuning and cleanup
- Hardware diagnostics and upgrades
- Data backup and recovery

### Software Troubleshooting
- Operating system repairs and reinstalls
- Application troubleshooting and updates
- Security and malware cleanup

### Wi-Fi & Network Solutions
- Site surveys and router tuning
- Mesh and extender setup
- Network security basics

### Small Business IT Support
- Workstation and server support
- Backup planning and recovery
- Software procurement guidance

## Pricing

- **Estimates:** Free
- **Consulting:** Starting at $100/hour

## Availability

- Evenings and weekends
- Flexible scheduling for small businesses
- Special arrangements available

## Contact Information

- **Email:** kyle@kbtechnical.services
- **Location:** West Monroe, Louisiana
- **Website:** https://www.kbtechnical.services

## Experience

- 10+ years of IT experience
- 1000+ devices serviced
- Locally trusted in West Monroe area
